name: Notion Simple To Do List
description: Organise your tasks and projects using this very simple and free Notion to-do list!What is included? Tasks database Overview, Today, Tomorrow, This Week, and This Month views. New task template, and four recurring task templates. Calendar view. Big Picture (Projects) Manage your tasks by grouping them within your 'Big Picture' groups that are just like projects. New Big Picture templates.
features: Tasks databaseOverview, Today, Tomorrow, This Week, and This Month views.New task template, and four recurring task templates.Calendar view.; Overview, Today, Tomorrow, This Week, and This Month views.; New task template, and four recurring task templates.; Calendar view.; Big Picture (Projects)Manage your tasks by grouping them within your 'Big Picture' groups that are just like projects.New Big Picture templates.; Manage your tasks by grouping them within your 'Big Picture' groups that are just like projects.; New Big Picture templates.
